verses.content: Chun, thilmak ropuitak vânah a hung inlang tah a; nuhmei nisaa inthuom, a ke hnuoia thla um, arasi sâwm le pahnia siem lallukhum khum a hung um a;
ama chun nau a vawn a; nauhase nain ân rûm a.
Chun, thilmak dang vânah a hung inlang nâwk a; ngai ta; drakon sen lientak lu sari le ki sâwm nei, lallukhum pasari khum a hung um a.
A mei chun vân arasi hmun thuma ṭhea hmun khat chu a kei a, hnuoiah a peithlâk tah a. Chun, a nei phaa a nau chu a lem theina dingin drakon chu nuhmei nau nei ding hmaa chun a ngîr zing a.
Chun, naupasal, hnam po po chunga thîr hmawla rorêl ding a nei a, chun, a nau chu Pathien kuoma le a lalṭhungphaa chun zuk lâkin a um tah a.
Chun, nuhmei chu thlalêra Pathien ibuotsai hmun a neinaa chun a tlân hmang a, chutaka chun ni sâng khat za hni sâwmruk an châwm theina dingin.
Chun, vâna chun indona a hung um a; Mikael le a vântirkohai chun drakon chu an do a;
drakon le a tirkohai khawm chun an do ve a; nisienlakhawm, an hne ta nawh a, an hmun chu vânah a um ta bawk nawh.
Chun, drakon lientak, Rûlpui tar, Diebol le Setan an ti, khawvêl po po hlêmtu chu, an pei thlâk tah a; hnuoiah an pei a, a tirkohai khawm an pei thlâk sa veh a.

Chun, vâna chun rawl inring- takin, “Tuhin chu ei Pathien sandam- na le thilthawtheina le ram chu a hung tlung tah a, a Krista thuneina leh; ei unauhai hêktu, ei Pathien hmaa a sûn a zâna hêk hlaktu chu, an pei thlâk ta sih a.
Berâmte thisen lei le an in- hriettirna thu leiin, ama chu an hne a nih; thi ngam khawpin an hringna an ngainêp bawk a.

Chuleiin, aw vânhai le a sûnga umhai, lâwm ro! Hnuoi le tuisuoriet, in chung a rik ie! Diebol chun hun tlâwmte chau a nei ti ân hriet leiin lunginsen bêk bêka in kuoma a hung thla ta leiin,” a ti ka hriet a.
Chun, drakon chun hnuoia pei thlâk a nih ti ân hriet phingleh nau- pasal neitu nuhmei chu a suknawm- na tah a.
Chuongchun, thlalêra a hmuna chun a vuong lût theina dingin nuhmei chu mupui lientak thla khing hni an pêk a, chutaka chun rûlpui hmu phâk nawah hun khat le hunhai le hun chenve sûng po châwm an tih.
Chun, rûlpui chun tuiin a lên hmang theina dingin nuhmei hnunga chun vadung ang elin a baua tui a pik suok a.
Nisienlakhawm, hnuoiin nuhmei chu a ṭhangpui a, hnuoi chun a bau a kah a, drakonin abaua inthawka a pik suok vadung chu a lem zo tah a.
Chuongchun, drakon chu nu- hmei chunga chun a hung lunginsen a, a thla la um Pathien thupêkhai zâwm a, Isu inhriettirna thu pawm- hai chu do dingin a fe tah a.
Chuongchun, tuisuoriet ṭieu- phoa chun a ngîr tah a.
